title: Poland - Business Visa
visa_fee: 9,800 BDT (Visa Fee & Service Charge) + ~10,000 BDT (Tourist Voucher) + Hotel Confirmation extra

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport (valid for at least 6 months beyond visa expiry)
Completed and signed Poland visa application form and tourist questionnaire
Clear purpose of travel such as tourism or business
Tourist voucher from a certified Polish travel agency (not a hotel booking)
Confirmed round-trip air ticket and paid hotel booking
Bank statement showing sufficient financial means
Employment certificate stating wages over past month/6 months/year
Proof of property ownership and family structure in Bangladesh
All documents must be submitted at least 30 days before intended travel

details.title: Required Documents
items: Visa application form (typed or legibly handwritten)
One passport-size photo (3.5 x 4.5 cm), glued to the form
Valid passport and photocopy of bio pages (valid for at least 6 months after visa expiry)
Invitation/guarantee letter from Polish business partner with detailed visit purpose
Notarized company registration and tax documents from Polish inviter
Proof of business ownership in Bangladesh (trade license, registration, etc.)
Bank statement of the Bangladeshi company and the applicant
Letter of credit, bill of lading, export/import records (if applicable)
Employer’s letter stating salary and position
Confirmed hotel reservation and flight booking
Certificate showing applicant’s family structure
Complete photocopy set of all submitted documents

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
